attributes.action: create a law to make sure everyone who applies for a job receives a letter, email or phone call back, successful or not.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lately, many people I know have applied for jobs either on-line or by post and have not received any news back as to whether they were successful or not.  This might be the fault of the Royal Mail or their computer, but more often than not it is the fault that the employers just do not respond to unsuccessful candidates.
